message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.GR, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with constructing lower envelopes of line segments, which is a fundamental problem in computational geometry. Therefore, cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is the most likely sub-category. The algorithm proposed in the paper is based on simple linear search and does not require complex data structures, which suggests that it may also be relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves analyzing the output size of the lower envelope, which is related to cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics). The lower envelope is constructed from monotone polygonal chains, which are a type of planar curves, indicating that the paper may also be relevant to cs.GR (Computer Graphics) and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
